Sentencas: This study proposes an integrated framework for planning distributed energy system with addressing the multi-objective optimization and multi-criteria evaluation issues simultaneously.
Titulo: A multi-objective optimization and multi-criteria evaluation integrated framework for distributed energy system optimal planning

Sentencas: The framework can be decomposed into two stages.
Titulo: A multi-objective optimization and multi-criteria evaluation integrated framework for distributed energy system optimal planning

Sentencas: At the optimization stage, the system design and dispatch are optimized considering multiple objectives by E-constraint method.
Titulo: A multi-objective optimization and multi-criteria evaluation integrated framework for distributed energy system optimal planning

Sentencas: Three decision making approaches are applied to identify the Pareto optimal solution.
Titulo: A multi-objective optimization and multi-criteria evaluation integrated framework for distributed energy system optimal planning

Sentencas: At the evaluation stage, a combined Analytic Hierarchy Process and Gray Relation Analysis method is proposed to evaluate and rank various optimal solutions when different objectives and cases are considered.
Titulo: A multi-objective optimization and multi-criteria evaluation integrated framework for distributed energy system optimal planning

Sentencas: Two stages of work are integrated by introducing the baseline conditions.
Titulo: A multi-objective optimization and multi-criteria evaluation integrated framework for distributed energy system optimal planning

Sentencas: As an illustrative example, an optimal planning model for a solar-assisted Solid Oxide Fuel Cell distributed energy system is proposed by Mixed Integer Non-linear Programming approach firstly.
Titulo: A multi-objective optimization and multi-criteria evaluation integrated framework for distributed energy system optimal planning

Sentencas: Then, the system is applied to different cases considering two types of buildings located in three climate zones.
Titulo: A multi-objective optimization and multi-criteria evaluation integrated framework for distributed energy system optimal planning

Sentencas: The obtained optimal solutions are further evaluated by the proposed multi-criteria evaluation method.
Titulo: A multi-objective optimization and multi-criteria evaluation integrated framework for distributed energy system optimal planning

Sentencas: Therefore, the overall optimal system design and dispatch strategy, as well as the best demonstration site can be identified comprehensively considering multiple objectives.
Titulo: A multi-objective optimization and multi-criteria evaluation integrated framework for distributed energy system optimal planning

Sentencas: In general, the results have verified the effectiveness of the proposed framework.
Titulo: A multi-objective optimization and multi-criteria evaluation integrated framework for distributed energy system optimal planning
